Suy ra: AB = |AB| = √(4²+1²) =√17, BC = |BC| = √((-1)²+2²) = √5,
AC = |AC| = √(3²+3²) = 3√2

cos A = cos(AB, AC) = (AB.AC)/(|AB|.|AC|) = (4.3+1.3)/(√17.3√2) ≈ 0,857 ⇒ A ≈ 30°57'.

cos B = cos(BA, BC) = (BA. BC)/(|BA|.|BC|) = ((-4). (-1)+(-1).2)/(√17.√5) ≈ 0,217 ⇒ B≈ 77°28'.

C = 180° -A-B ≈ 180° - 30°57' -77°28′ = 71°35'.
